## JsonEditorConverter.array() method

Gets a derived converter which fails if the resulting converted `JsonValue` is not a `JsonArray`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
array(): Converter<JsonArray, IJsonContext>;
```
**Returns:**

Converter&lt;JsonArray, [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md)<!-- -->&gt;
